
<center><h1><span style="color:CadetBlue"> Kelp Harvest Bed Explorer </span></h1></center>
This map shows *Macrocystis pyrifera* beds in Southern California. Use the buttons in the bottom left to toggle between the following:

1. Interactive visualization of kelp biomass loss due to wave activity throughout the year.

2. Visualization of current kelp biomass in each historical kelp bed.

3. Proportional persistence of kelp beds (1984-2018).

You can also choose to show or hide the historical kelp harvest beds.
